0.0.16.en: fix edge case in rendering broadcasts / remove dead code / reuse svg icons / repair update marker / fix css for favorites / repair deferred updatemarker after manual scroll

0.0.15.en: fix dialog setting / introduce settings for dialog with and height / repair channel sort / fill broadcast gaps if no data before 5:00

0.0.14.en: fix dialog setting / introduce settings for dialog with and height / repair channel sort / fill broadcast gaps if no data before 5:00

0.0.13.en: fix pixel error in channel column / copy broadcast details to clipboard from detailview / config of markerposition

0.0.12.en: show only one date in header / show play button only if time / implement favorites

0.0.10.en: introduce center buttons for zoom and navigation / new datapoint selectchannel / click on channel logo trigger this datapoint / icon for selectchannel in broadcast detail view / datapoint handling in adapter

0.0.9.en: fix dynamic config of width/height / fix invisible overlay color / new burger icon / configurable header and broadcast font-size / add header navigation with date info

0.0.7.en: resolve 2 or more same widgets problem / improve readme / add widget icon / add alternating colors to widget / implement variable width and height / improve loading logic for past values / fix display for edge case / implement navigation logic / implement zomm logic

0.0.6.en: introduce client/server data handling / remove dead code / implement file caching / implement old caching file removal

desc.en: This adapter polls information about the television program at regular intervals. The data can be displayed in various widgets
desc.de: Dieser Adapter fragt in regelmäßigen Abständen Informationen über das Fernsehprogramm ab.
desc.ru: Этот адаптер регулярно запрашивает информацию о телевизионной программе.
desc.pt: Este adaptador pesquisa informações sobre o programa de televisão em intervalos regulares.
desc.nl: Deze adapter vraagt ​​regelmatig informatie over het televisieprogramma.
desc.fr: Cet adaptateur interroge les informations sur le programme de télévision à intervalles réguliers.
desc.it: Questo adattatore esegue il polling delle informazioni sul programma televisivo a intervalli regolari.
desc.es: Este adaptador recopila información sobre el programa de televisión a intervalos regulares.
desc.pl: Ten adapter odpytuje informacje o programie telewizyjnym w regularnych odstępach czasu.
desc.zh-cn: 该适配器定期轮询有关电视节目的信息。
